Exclusion criterion : previous cardiac surgery , schedule surgery le 3 distal anastomosis , leave ventricular ejection fraction < 45 % , chronic renal failure ( defined preoperative creatinine > 177 µmol/L ) aortic insufficiency ≥ grade 1 . The medical ethic committee St. Antonius Hospital approve study write informed consent obtain patient prior surgical procedure . An infusion pump use addition KCl/Mg SO4 . Each dose give period 2 minute . Every 15 minute administration blood cardioplegia repeat . In case recur ECG activity , blood cardioplegia give aberrant interval .
